Naive idoits. This game is meant for Windows Vista, set compatibility to Windows Vista.

To all Reloaded version players, Just extract this patch to a different location instead of the original location of the game. For eg, make a folder called JC DLC on your desktop and extract it there. Now, open JC DLC folder, there will be a dlc folder. Copy this folder to the folder where Just Cause 2 is installed, don't even touch other files. Thats it, play the game. No need to change save game locations or any such shit.

THANKS!!!! this is awesome.  had to make a workaround since i used another game-cracker's just cause 2.

for those who use this and suddenly find that their saves have gone missing

1.open you just cause 2 folder
2.copy all the files that say "justcause2savXX"    where xx is the save file number (non-important)
3.open your C:\User\yourusername\appdata\local\skidrow\SAVES\
4. paste all the save files into that folder
5. Restart the game. you should now be able to continue the game with the awesome extras.

This DLC torrent works perfect with no viruses detected by COMODO, MalwareBytes, or WSE.

Downloaded, copied to skidrow folder and played. At first I did not have all my saved games, so then I copied all the files in my Justcause2 folder and pasted them in the new skidrow folder this torrent creates. Game works perfect and saves are no a problem.

1. Open downloaded torrent using winRAR. 
2. Run the launcher that is included in this torrent.
3.Copied all of the existing files in c:program/justcause2 to the new SKIDROW foler located - C:Users/YOURUSER/AppData/Local/SKIDROW/SAVES/8190
4. restart the game.

!make sure to create a system backup before doing this.

Hope this helps.
